text: Ponta Creek is a stream in the U.S. states of Alabama and Mississippi. It is a tributary to the Sucarnoochee River. Ponta is a name derived from the Choctaw language purported to mean "mouse". Variant names are "Panthe Creek" and "Ponti Creek". ==References== Category:Rivers of Alabama Category:Bodies of water of Sumter County, Alabama Category:Rivers of Mississippi Category:Bodies of water of Kemper County, Mississippi Category:Bodies of water of Lauderdale County, Mississippi
title: Ponta Creek
